title: Dan Snyder ‘Needs to Be Removed,’ Says One N.F.L. Owner
description: After Jim Irsay of the Colts said that there was “merit” to forcing Snyder, the Commanders owner, out of the league, Commissioner Roger Goodell warned the other owners not to speculate about the future of the team.
dc:creator: Ken Belson and Jenny Vrentas
media:description: Dan Snyder is facing investigations by the N.F.L. and Congress into allegations that he sexually harassed employees, among other violations.
